title: PLS RIOT HLP
body: so every time i try to change my masteries or or save them i get this error that occurs saving go the the support site and look at that and crap but when i went there there was nothing on why my masteries wont work i have look at discusion boards and a bunch of crap to find out why it wont work i even re downloaded my client and still nothing so i went to my other account to try this and every thing was fine so pls look at my account and tell me what is wrong here is my name "Batt13Br0"

replies.body: What error are you getting exactly?  Are you changing your masteries while in champion select or before?  Is this on the legacy or updated client?
